full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGO NAS RAB GNAS BYED TSUL BYIN RLABS KYI ROL MTSO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @034B CES RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGO GNAS RAB GNAS BYED TSUL BYIN RLABS KYI ROL MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RAB GNAS KYI CHO GA TU MA DANG, ,DAM PA'I PHYAG BZHES MTHONG BRGYUD BZHIN` `RANG BZHAN LA PHAN 'DOD KYI BSAM PAS BTZUN GZUGS, ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS 'PHAN PA ZHES PA LCAGS MO GLANG GI LO DBYAR DUS YI DGA' MA LANG TSO BAB PA NA, ,SKYED @035A *, ,MOS TSAL GYI BSTI GNAS YID DGA'I 'CHOS 'PHEL DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI AOR DU DGE BLO BZANG KUN DGAS BGYIS PA SARBA DZA YANTU,, ,,
